mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND SUBJECT_TYPE_CD = #{subjectTypeCd}

SELECT A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ , A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD ,
, A.SRT_NO , A.CONTENT , A.ANSWER , A.CMNTR , B.QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ , B.USER_ID , B.USER_ANSWER , B.ANSWER_CHK FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM QUIZ_USER_ANS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ) B ON A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = B.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ WHERE A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = #{quizMstrInfoSeq}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUBJECT_TYPE_CD, SRT_NO) AS rno , QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ AS quizMstrInfoSeq , SUBJECT_TYPE_CD AS subjectTypeCd , SRT_NO AS srtNo FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND SUBJECT_TYPE_CD = ${subjectTypeCd}
